title: If a dog's nose touched something, does it have to be washed? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Afzan from India Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu So yesterday I asked you about do I have to wash a utensil that is touched by a dog that it was by dog nose and I and I didn't understand the answer you gave me so can you What was there not to understand you Afzan? You said that you say about the dog licking the utensil but I asked about the dog nose touching it okay is the nose same as the licking yes or no no so the answer is clear the dog's nose has nothing to do with licking if the dog sniffs something then there's no problem the problem is then there's no problem the problem is in the saliva of the dog not in the wetness of the dog's nose I hope this answers your question
